mapper.insert: insert into aflpa(aflpa_name, aflpa_number, aflpa_bDate, aflpa_useFor, aflpa_bName, aflpa_bTele, aflpa_facultyID, aflpa_isPermited) values (#{aflpa_name}, #{aflpa_number}, #{aflpa_bDate}, #{aflpa_useFor}, #{aflpa_bName}, #{aflpa_bTele}, #{aflpa_facultyID}, #{aflpa_isPermited})
mapper.update: update aflpa set aflpa_name=#{aflpa_name}, aflpa_number=#{aflpa_number}, aflpa_bDate=#{aflpa_bDate}, aflpa_useFor=#{aflpa_useFor}, aflpa_bName=#{aflpa_bName}, aflpa_bTele=#{aflpa_bTele}, aflpa_facultyID=#{aflpa_facultyID}, aflpa_isPermited=#{aflpa_isPermited} where aflpa_ID = #{aflpa_ID}
